page.title: 12Two Local Sports Teams
page.content: {Baltasound United F.C. }Became united with Uyeasound in the early Sixties because there were not enough players to form a strong team in either area.The team's football pitch is Harry's Park which they share with a flock of sheep. They hope to get a new purpose built pitch in the future. The average age of the present team is about 22 and there is a lot of local interest locally amongst teenagers.The new strip is white with black pin stripes,black shorts and socks. {Baltasound Badminton Club.}Badminton is one of the most popular sports and is played regularly through the winter in the Baltasound Hall. There is an 'A'and'B' team which compete with teams from around the island. There is a knockout championship for anyone who wants to take part at the end of the season.
